MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH48 postcode area of Bathgate, affecting properties incDundas Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:33am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 06:12am on the 4th of December 2020
